pages.text: A vessel containing the essence of a captured entity. Right-click on a block to release the stored creature back into the world.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Capturing:$()$(br)Mob Souls are typically created by killing entities with specific Blood Magic tools or rituals.$(br2)$(bold)Releasing:$()$(br)Right-click on any block face to spawn the captured entity adjacent to that face.$(br2)The entity's full data is preserved, including:$(li)Health and status effects$(li)Equipment$(li)Custom names$(li)AI state
